header.description: Web developer with a passion for creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites.

about.txt-titulo: Why Hire Me for Your Next Project?
about.txt-subtitulo: I am a software developer with experience creating innovative technological solutions.
about.txt-body: Self-motivated, proactive and results orientated, always looking to push myself to present more creative and challenging projects. Consistently growing and open to learning new techniques and technologies.

lastProject.title: Latest project
lastProject.desc: Designed to offer an intuitive experience for users, with secure authentication, integration with payment methods, and automatic shipping quotes via email, it is an efficient and scalable solution. For administrators: An advanced admin panel that allows real-time management of books, categories, users, and sales.
lastProject.others: Responsive design, notification system with Toast, advanced filters.
